page.title: 03Arts and Crafts
page.content: There are three members from our part of the community involved in craft work. All are people who recently moved into the area. Most of them receive financial help from various grant awarding bodies. The main crafts are weaving, embroidery, knitting and leather work. In fact a purpose-built tannery is in the final stages of completion just now. These craft products are sold by mail-order as well as to personal callers to the individual premises. They prove very popular with the tourists who visit our area. These enterprises provide very necessary employment for some of the local people.{
